text: Fomɨra Israelian gumazamiziba, Moses Osirizir Araziba ini, ezɨ arazir kam kamaghɨn mɨgei, Livain gumaziba Godɨn ofa gamir ingangarim damu. Eghtɨ Livain gumazibar ofa gamir ingangarim, a gumazamizibar amutɨ me bar deraghvɨra ikɨtɨ, manmaghsua God ghaze, ofa gamir gumazir igharazim gɨn otivam? A Melkisedeghɨn mɨn ikɨva, Aronɨn mɨn ikian kogham.
